title: Is the pixel 4a 5g gonna release in India?
content:
Been reading some articles online that the pixel 4a 5g is going to release in India by 24th December. But I'm not sure how reliable is the source. The minor shot-comings of the pixel 4a like the older processor and the missing wide lens has gotten me a wavering to buy it. 
If anyone has any concrete evidence that Google is going to launch the pixel 4a 5g in india, your response is much awaited and appreciated.
